Module com.example.miniproyecto4
Package com.example.miniproyecto4.model.GameSave

Interface ISerializer

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameSerializer
public interface ISerializer
Interface defining serialization and deserialization operations for game data. Provides methods to persist game state to files and restore it.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    SerializableGameData
    deserialize(String filename)
    Deserializes game data from a file.
    void
    serialize(SerializableGameData data, String filename)
    Serializes game data to a file.

  • Method Details

    • serialize

      void serialize(SerializableGameData data, String filename)
      Serializes game data to a file. Writes the game state to persistent storage.
      Parameters:
      data - the game data to serialize
      filename - the name of the file to write to

    • deserialize

      SerializableGameData deserialize(String filename)
      Deserializes game data from a file. Reads and restores the game state from persistent storage.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the file to read from
      Returns:
      the deserialized game data, or null if deserialization fails
